title: Introducing: From Hadria
content:
From Hadria are a duo hailing from Manila, the capital of the Philippines, and with their debut track Butterfly Effect they conjure up a gorgeously enticing soundscape.

Part Portishead, part Massive Attack, the vocals are spaciously lush and the dubstep influenced beat is pleasantly relaxing. In terms of more recently hyped artists, itâ€™s lightly comparable to the likes of Purity Ring and Keep Shelly In Athens, with Butterfly Effect proving sensual and numbingly addictive; just a shame this is all the duo have to offer so far. Stream Butterfly Effect below, and download it for free via the From Hadria bandcamp.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
